## Reading and processing data

```{r}
irisz <- read.csv("data/iris.csv")
head(irisz)
```

* Scholars know how to find a file-reading function, know of a few
* Scholars can use read.csv to read a file and save it as a variable, and tune some arguments
* Scholars know that it is important to preview data and look for issues, and have some strategies/functions to do this
* Scholars know what NAs are, some strategies to deal with these
* Scholars know how to cast/transform value Types
* Scholars know how to scale/normalize values
* Scholars know how to filter entries in a data.frame
